textAfterTable: The Library has a limit on the number of items a patron can check out in these categories: 6 DVDs per person 4 Blu-Rays per person 2 Videogames per person A cash deposit is required for items included in the “Deposit Required” collection. (GED, ASVAB, Kill-A-Watt Power Meter) There are two ways to renew your items from the convenience of home: Renewing Online Go to the Library Catalog Page. Click on My Card and follow the prompts. Or simply click here. Renew by Telephone To renew your items by phone please call 847-623-2041 ext. 239 during library hours. You must have your library card number ready and all barcodes for the items you want to renew. Using this system you may: Renew checked out items * Get a list of items that are currently checked out to you Check for overdue fines * Please Note: You can renew your loan even after its due date. However, you will not be able to renew anything if you have a fine of $10.00 or more. Renewing will not waive a fine that has already occurred. Placing Holds Locate the desired item in the catalog.
